Generates an Instagram post using Canvafy based on the provided details.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the Instagram user.

parameters.name: likeCount
parameters.description: The number of likes on the post.

parameters.name: likeText
parameters.description: Text for the like count display.

parameters.name: postImage
parameters.description: URL of the Instagram post image.

parameters.name: story
parameters.description: Whether the post is part of a story.

parameters.name: liked
parameters.description: Whether the post is liked by the user.

parameters.name: saved
parameters.description: Whether the post is saved by the user.

image.description: Generated Instagram post in Base64 format

get.description: Generates an Instagram post using Canvafy based on the provided details.

parameters.name: story
parameters.description: Apakah postingan bagian dari story (true atau false).

parameters.name: liked
parameters.description: Apakah postingan disukai oleh pengguna (true atau false).

parameters.name: saved
parameters.description: Apakah postingan disimpan oleh pengguna (true atau false).

image.description: Generated Instagram post in Base64 format

get.description: Generates a level-up card for a user using Canvafy.

parameters.name: border
parameters.description: The hex color code for the border.

parameters.name: avatarBorder
parameters.description: The hex color code for the avatar border.

parameters.name: currentLevel
parameters.description: The current level of the user.

parameters.name: nextLevel
parameters.description: The next level of the user.

image.description: Generated level-up card image in Base64 format

get.description: Generates a security card for a user based on their account information using Canvafy.

parameters.name: createdTimestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

parameters.name: suspectTimestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp for the suspected activity, usually in milliseconds.

parameters.name: border
parameters.description: The hex color code for the border.

parameters.name: avatarBorder
parameters.description: The hex color code for the avatar border.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale (country code) for the display text.

image.description: Generated security card image in Base64 format

get.description: Generates a Spotify card using Canvafy based on the provided details.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: The artist or author of the song.

parameters.name: timestampStart
parameters.description: The starting timestamp of the song (in milliseconds).

parameters.name: timestampEnd
parameters.description: The ending timestamp of the song (in milliseconds).

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The URL of the album image.

image.description: Generated Spotify card image in Base64 format

Generates a tweet card using canvafy based on the provided user details.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name of the user for the tweet card.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user for the tweet card.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The comment text for the tweet card.

schema.example: This is a tweet card. Enjoy!

parameters.name: avatar
parameters.description: URL of the user's avatar image.
